The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course focuses mainly on listening to sample lectures from the textbook. However, students can expect daily pair and group assignments, as well as speech presentations and discussion projects.

For the Fall semester 2022, this course will be held face to face, but may include some ONLINE content in both simultaneous two-way or on-demand format.
